## Read in dataset
```{r}
cdi = read_csv("./cdi.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
cdi
```

```{r}
## no missing value
cdi %>% 
  select(everything()) %>%  
  summarise_all(funs(sum(is.na(.))))
```
## Data cleaning
```{r}
cdi = 
  cdi %>% 
  mutate(crm_1000 = crimes/pop*1000,  # as indicated by the project prompt
         docs_rate_1000 = docs/pop*1000,  # every 1000 people how many doctors
         beds_docs = beds/docs)
cdi
```
